scripts.build:dev: nodemon -w src/index.html -w src/index.js -w src/style.scss -es,scss,html -x "npm run build"
scripts.prebuild: jshint src/index.js && mkdirp docs && cp src/index.html docs/ && mkdirp docs/image-diffs
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o docs/bundle.js && node-sass src/style.scss docs/style.css && js-beautify src/index.js -o src/index.js
